label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Chicken Alfredo Zoodles

Ingredients:
- 2 medium zucchinis, spiralized
- 1 lb chicken breast, sliced
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1/2 cup heavy cream
- 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chicken slices and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add spiralized zucchini noodles to the skillet and sauté for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened.
4. Pour in heavy cream and grated parmesan cheese, stirring to combine. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens.
5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet, mixing well with the zoodles and sauce.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Keto Chicken Alfredo Zoodles garnished with chopped parsley. Enjoy!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Zucchini Noodles with Pesto and Cherry Tomatoes

Ingredients:
- 2 medium zucchinis, spiralized
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves
- 1/4 cup pine nuts
- 2 cloves garlic
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/3 cup olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste

Preparation:
1. In a food processor, combine the basil, pine nuts, garlic, and Parmesan cheese. Pulse until finely chopped.
2. With the food processor running, slowly drizzle in the olive oil until a smooth pesto sauce forms. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a large skillet, sauté the cherry tomatoes over medium heat until they start to soften, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the zucchini noodles to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the noodles are heated through but still slightly crunchy.
5. Remove the skillet from heat and stir in the pesto sauce until the noodles are well coated.
6. Serve the zucchini noodles with pesto and cherry tomatoes hot, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese if desired. Enjoy!

label: keto
text:
Title: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Chicken

Ingredients:
- 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Preparation:
1. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper on both sides.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute until fragrant.
4. Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a simmer. Scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the skillet.
5. Stir in the heavy cream and Parmesan cheese until the sauce is smooth and creamy.
6. Return the chicken breasts to the skillet and simmer in the sauce for another 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
7. Garnish with chopped parsley before serving. Enjoy your creamy garlic Parmesan chicken!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Garlic Parmesan Crusted Salmon

Ingredients:
- 4 salmon fillets
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tablespoons melted butter
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Chopped fresh parsley for garnish

Preparation:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. In a small bowl, mix together the Parmesan cheese, minced garlic, melted butter, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Place the salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet and pat them dry with paper towels.
4. Divide the Parmesan mixture evenly among the salmon fillets, spreading it over the top of each fillet.
5. Bake the salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and the crust is golden brown.
6. Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving. Enjoy your delicious Keto Garlic Parmesan Crusted Salmon!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Zucchini Noodle Carbonara

Ingredients:
- 2 medium zucchinis, spiralized
- 4 slices of bacon, chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 large eggs
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Preparation:
1. Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the chopped bacon until crispy. Remove bacon from the skillet and set aside, leaving the bacon grease in the skillet.
2. In the same skillet, add the minced garlic and sauté for a minute until fragrant.
3. Add the zucchini noodles to the skillet and sauté for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs and Parmesan cheese. Pour the egg mixture over the zucchini noodles and quickly toss to combine, ensuring the eggs coat the noodles evenly.
5. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly, until the eggs are cooked and the sauce has thickened.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Sprinkle the crispy bacon on top and garnish with chopped parsley before serving. Enjoy your keto zucchini noodle carbonara!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese

Ingredients:
- 1 head of cauliflower, cut into florets
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Optional: cooked bacon bits for topping

Preparation:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a baking dish.
2. In a large pot, bring water to a boil and cook the cauliflower florets until tender, about 5-7 minutes. Drain well and set aside.
3. In a saucepan, heat the heavy cream over medium heat until it simmers. Stir in the cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
4. Add the cooked cauliflower to the cheese sauce and mix well to coat.
5. Transfer the cauliflower mixture to the prepared baking dish and sprinkle with additional cheddar cheese and bacon bits if desired.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
7. Let cool slightly before serving. Enjoy your keto cauliflower mac and cheese!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese

Ingredients:
- 1 head of cauliflower, cut into florets
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Chopped fresh parsley for garnish

Preparation:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a baking dish.
2. Steam the cauliflower florets until they are tender but still slightly firm. Drain and set aside.
3. In a saucepan, heat the heavy cream over medium heat until it starts to simmer.
4. Stir in the cheddar and Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
5. Add the garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper to the cheese mixture and stir to combine.
6. Place the steamed cauliflower in the greased baking dish and pour the cheese sauce over the top, ensuring the cauliflower is evenly coated.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and slightly golden on top.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly before garnishing with chopped parsley.
9. Serve hot as a delicious and keto-friendly alternative to traditional mac and cheese. Enjoy!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Lemon Garlic Butter Shrimp

Ingredients:
- 1 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 tbsp butter
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 lemon, juiced and zested
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (optional)

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes per side.
4. Season the shrimp with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and lemon zest. Stir to combine.
5. Remove the skillet from heat and garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.
6. Serve the keto lemon garlic butter shrimp hot and enjoy!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Cauliflower Fried Rice

Ingredients:
- 1 head of cauliflower, riced
- 2 tablespoons sesame oil
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 cup mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, peas, and carrots)
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 3 tablespoons soy sauce or tamari
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Green onions, for garnish

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat sesame oil over medium heat.
2. Add chopped onion and minced garlic, sauté until fragrant.
3. Add in the mixed vegetables and cook until they start to soften.
4. Push the vegetables to one side of the pan and pour the beaten eggs into the other side. Scramble the eggs until cooked through.
5. Add the riced cauliflower to the pan and mix well with the vegetables and eggs.
6. Pour soy sauce over the cauliflower mixture and stir to combine. Cook for a few more minutes until everything is heated through.
7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving. Enjoy your keto cauliflower fried rice!

label: keto
text:
Title: Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese

Ingredients:
- 1 medium head of cauliflower, cut into florets
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Chopped fresh parsley, for garnish

Preparation:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a baking dish.
2. Steam the cauliflower florets until tender, then drain and set aside.
3. In a saucepan, heat the heavy cream over medium heat. Add the minced garlic, mustard powder, salt, and pepper. Stir until well combined.
4. Stir in the shredded cheddar cheese and half of the grated Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
5. Add the steamed cauliflower to the cheese sauce and mix well to coat the florets.
6. Transfer the cauliflower and cheese mixture to the prepared baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining Parmesan cheese on top.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
8. Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving. Enjoy your keto cauliflower mac and cheese!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Coconut Curry Lentil Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon coconut oil
- 1 onion, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon curry powder
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon ground turmeric
- 1 cup dried red lentils
- 4 cups vegetable broth
- 1 can (14 oz) coconut milk
- 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Fresh cilantro, for garnish

Preparation:
1. In a large pot, heat coconut oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic, and sauté until softened.
2. Stir in the curry powder, cumin, and turmeric, and cook for another minute to toast the spices.
3. Add the dried red lentils, vegetable broth, coconut milk, and diced tomatoes to the pot. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are cooked through.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the coconut curry lentil soup hot, garnished with fresh cilantro. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Creamy Coconut Chickpea Curry

Ingredients:
- 1 can of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 can of coconut milk
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 1 zucchini, sliced
- 1 tablespoon curry powder
- 1 teaspoon turmeric
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh cilantro for garnish
- Cooked rice or naan bread for serving

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, sauté the diced onion and minced garlic in a bit of oil until softened.
2. Add the sliced red bell pepper and zucchini to the skillet and cook for a few minutes until they start to soften.
3. Stir in the curry powder, turmeric, and cumin, and cook for another minute to toast the spices.
4. Add the drained chickpeas and coconut milk to the skillet, stirring to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Let the curry simmer for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the creamy coconut chickpea curry over cooked rice or with naan bread, and garnish with fresh cilantro. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Spicy Chickpea and Vegetable Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 can of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 1 yellow bell pepper, sliced
- 1 zucchini, sliced
- 1 onion, sliced
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon of soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of sriracha sauce
- 1 tablespoon of maple syrup
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Cooked rice or quinoa, for serving

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and sauté until fragrant.
2. Add the bell peppers and zucchini to the skillet. Cook for 5-7 minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.
3. Add the chickpeas to the skillet and stir well to combine with the vegetables.
4. In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, sriracha sauce, and maple syrup. Pour the sauce over the chickpea and vegetable mixture.
5. Stir well to coat everything evenly. Cook for another 2-3 minutes.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the spicy chickpea and vegetable stir-fry over cooked rice or quinoa. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Roasted Chickpea and Vegetable Quinoa Bowl

Ingredients:
- 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 1 zucchini, sliced
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon paprika
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish

Preparation:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a bowl, combine chickpeas, bell pepper, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat the vegetables evenly.
3. Spread the vegetable mixture on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4. Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through, until the vegetables are tender and chickpeas are crispy.
5. In a serving bowl, layer cooked quinoa and roasted vegetable mixture.
6. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
7. Enjoy your delicious and nutritious Roasted Chickpea and Vegetable Quinoa Bowl!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Spicy Chickpea and Sweet Potato Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 onion, diced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 can (15 oz) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced
- 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes
- 3 cups vegetable broth
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh cilantro, for garnish

Preparation:
1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes.
2. Add minced garlic, ground cumin, smoked paprika, and chili powder to the pot. Stir and cook for another minute until fragrant.
3. Add chickpeas, diced sweet potato, diced tomatoes, and vegetable broth to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are tender.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the stew hot, garnished with fresh cilantro. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Creamy Vegan Mushroom Pasta

Ingredients:
- 8 oz of pasta of your choice
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 onion, diced
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 8 oz of mushrooms, sliced
- 1 can of coconut milk
- 1 tbsp nutritional yeast
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Fresh parsley, for garnish

Preparation:
1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened.
3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the pan and cook until they are golden brown and softened.
4. Pour in the can of coconut milk and stir in the nutritional yeast. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Let the sauce simmer for 5-7 minutes until it thickens slightly.
6. Add the cooked pasta to the pan and toss to coat the pasta with the creamy mushroom sauce.
7. Serve the creamy vegan mushroom pasta hot, garnished with fresh parsley. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Creamy Mushroom and Spinach Pasta

Ingredients:
- 8 oz fettuccine pasta
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 onion, diced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 8 oz mushrooms, sliced
- 2 cups fresh spinach
- 1 cup unsweetened almond milk
- 2 tbsp nutritional yeast
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish

Instructions:
1. Cook the fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until fragrant.
3. Add sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender and browned.
4. Stir in fresh spinach and cook until wilted.
5. Pour in almond milk and nutritional yeast, stirring to combine. Let the sauce simmer for a few minutes until it thickens.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat with the creamy mushroom and spinach sauce.
8. Serve the creamy mushroom and spinach pasta hot, garnished with fresh parsley. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Spicy Chickpea and Vegetable Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 can of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced
- 1 yellow bell pepper, sliced
- 1 onion, sliced
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon of soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon of sriracha sauce
- 1 tablespoon of maple syrup
- 1 teaspoon of ground ginger
- Cooked rice, for serving
- Fresh cilantro, for garnish

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat.
2. Add the sliced bell peppers, onion, and garlic to the skillet and sauté until the vegetables are slightly softened.
3. Add the drained chickpeas to the skillet and continue to cook for another 5 minutes.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, sriracha sauce, maple syrup, and ground ginger.
5. Pour the sauce over the chickpea and vegetable mixture in the skillet and stir to combine.
6. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until everything is well coated and heated through.
7. Serve the spicy chickpea and vegetable stir-fry over cooked rice and garnish with fresh cilantro. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Spicy Chickpea and Sweet Potato Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 onion, chopped
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon ground cumin
- 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
- 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional)
- 1 sweet potato, peeled and diced
- 1 can (15 oz) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
- 1 can (14 oz) diced tomatoes
- 3 cups vegetable broth
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh cilantro, chopped (for garnish)

Preparation:
1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Stir in the cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, and cayenne pepper. Cook for another minute until fragrant.
3. Add the sweet potato, chickpeas, diced tomatoes, and vegetable broth. Bring the stew to a boil, then reduce heat and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
5. Serve the stew hot, garnished with fresh cilantro. Enjoy!

label: vegan
text:
Title: Creamy Vegan Mushroom Stroganoff

Ingredients:
- 8 oz fettuccine pasta
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- 1 onion, diced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 10 oz mushrooms, sliced
- 1 can (14 oz) coconut milk
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp nutritional yeast
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Fresh parsley, for garnish

Preparation:
1. Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced onion and minced garlic, and sauté until softened.
3. Add sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they release their juices and start to brown.
4. Pour in the coconut milk, soy sauce, and nutritional yeast. Stir well to combine.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Simmer for 5-7 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
6. Add the cooked fettuccine pasta to the skillet and toss to coat with the creamy mushroom sauce.
7. Serve the creamy vegan mushroom stroganoff hot, garnished with fresh parsley. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese

Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground beef
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 carrot, diced
- 1 celery stalk, diced
- 1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 1 cup beef broth
- 1/2 cup red wine (optional)
- 1 tsp dried oregano
- 1 tsp dried basil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 lb spaghetti
- Grated Parmesan cheese, for serving

Preparation:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add the chopped onion, minced garlic, diced carrot, and diced celery to the pot. Cook for about 5 minutes until vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, beef broth, red wine (if using), dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer then reduce heat to low. Cover and let the sauce simmer for at least 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. While the sauce is simmering, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain.
5. Serve the spaghetti topped with the bolognese sauce and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara

Ingredients:
- 12 oz spaghetti
- 6 slices of bacon, chopped
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 2 large eggs
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (optional for garnish)

Preparation:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain the spaghetti.
2. In a large skillet, cook the chopped bacon over medium heat until crispy. Add in the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
3. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
4. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet with the bacon and garlic. Toss to combine.
5. Remove the skillet from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, ensuring the spaghetti is evenly coated. If the sauce is too thick, gradually add some of the reserved pasta water.
6. Serve the spaghetti carbonara hot, garnished with chopped parsley if desired. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Beef Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lbs stewing beef, cut into chunks
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 3 carrots, peeled and chopped
- 2 stalks celery, chopped
- 2 potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 can diced tomatoes
- 4 cups beef broth
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- Salt and pepper to taste

Preparation:
1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the beef chunks and brown on all sides. Remove the beef from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the onion and garlic. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the carrots, celery, and potatoes to the pot. Cook for another 5 minutes.
4. Return the beef to the pot and add the diced tomatoes, beef broth, thyme, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, until the beef is tender.
5. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper as needed. Serve hot and enjoy!

label: regular
text:
**Creamy Chicken Alfredo Pasta**

**Ingredients:**
- 8 oz fettuccine pasta
- 2 chicken breasts, sliced into thin strips
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped for garnish

**Preparation:**
1. Cook the fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced chicken breasts and cook until no longer pink, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for 1 minute.
4. Pour in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in the grated Parmesan cheese until melted and well combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Add the cooked fettuccine pasta to the skillet and toss to coat in the creamy Alfredo sauce.
6. Serve the creamy chicken Alfredo pasta hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese

Ingredients:
- 1 pound ground beef
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 carrot, grated
- 1 celery stalk, finely chopped
- 1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 1/2 cup beef broth
- 1/4 cup red wine
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1 teaspoon dried basil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 pound spaghetti
- Grated Parmesan cheese, for serving

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium-high heat until fully cooked. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add the onion, garlic, carrot, and celery to the skillet. Cook for 5 minutes until the vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, beef broth, red wine, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. While the sauce is simmering, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
5. Serve the spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce and a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Beef Lasagna

Ingredients:
- 1 pound ground beef
- 1 onion, diced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1 teaspoon dried basil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 9 lasagna noodles, cooked al dente
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1 cup ricotta cheese
- Fresh basil leaves, for garnish

Preparation:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Add the diced onion and minced garlic, and cook until softened.
3. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for about 10 minutes.
4. In a greased 9x13 inch baking dish, spread a thin layer of the meat sauce on the bottom. Arrange 3 cooked lasagna noodles on top.
5. Spread a layer of ricotta cheese over the noodles, followed by a layer of the meat sauce and a sprinkle of mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used, ending with a layer of meat sauce on top.
6. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
7. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
8. Let the lasagna rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese

Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground beef
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 carrot, grated
- 1 celery stalk, diced
- 1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 1 cup beef broth
- 1 tsp dried oregano
- 1 tsp dried basil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 lb spaghetti
- Grated Parmesan cheese (optional, for serving)

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium-high heat until cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add the diced onion, minced garlic, grated carrot, and diced celery to the skillet with the beef. Cook until the vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, beef broth, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for about 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. While the sauce is simmering, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain the pasta.
5. Serve the spaghetti topped with the bolognese sauce. Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese if desired. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara

Ingredients:
- 12 oz spaghetti
- 6 slices of bacon, diced
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 3 eggs
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and black pepper, to taste
- Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Preparation:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and reserve 1 cup of pasta water.
2. In a large skillet, cook the diced bacon over medium heat until crispy. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
3. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.
4. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet with the bacon and garlic. Toss to combine.
5. Remove the skillet from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, ensuring the pasta is evenly coated. If the sauce is too thick, add some reserved pasta water.
6. Serve the spaghetti carbonara hot, garnished with chopped parsley. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese

Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground beef
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 carrot, grated
- 1 celery stalk, diced
- 1 can (14 oz) crushed tomatoes
- 1 cup beef broth
- 1 tsp dried oregano
- 1 tsp dried basil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 12 oz spaghetti
- Grated Parmesan cheese for serving

Preparation:
1. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add the diced onion, minced garlic, grated carrot, and diced celery to the skillet. Cook for about 5 minutes until the vegetables are softened.
3. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, beef broth, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
5. Serve the bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese. Enjoy!

label: regular
text:
Title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara

Ingredients:
- 12 oz spaghetti
- 6 slices of bacon, diced
- 3 cloves of garlic, minced
- 3 large eggs
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt and black pepper
- Fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)

Preparation:
1. Cook spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti.
2. In a large skillet, cook the diced bacon over medium heat until crispy. Add minced garlic and cook for another minute.
3. In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, and a pinch of salt and black pepper.
4. Add the drained spaghetti to the skillet with the bacon and garlic. Toss to combine.
5. Remove the skillet from heat and quickly pour in the egg mixture. Stir well to coat the spaghetti evenly. If the sauce is too thick, add some of the reserved pasta water.
6. Serve the spaghetti carbonara hot, garnished with chopped parsley and extra Parmesan cheese. Enjoy!
